r.s: mysqlnd_azure - a redirection plugin for mysqlnd
r.n: - 1. New connection attribute "_extension_version", indicate the mysqlnd_azure extension build version. - 2. Fix memory collect mnd_ prefix alloc crash and add a test case for enable mysqlnd.collect_memory_statistics. - 3. Add support for two redirection info format. - 4. Add support to enable runtime log, check myslqnd_azure_log.md - 5. Add doc for general troubleshooting.
